objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Pink Drop Wreath Design
• Perfect Gift for Her
• 6 Month Warranty

Elegant wreath design earrings
with sparkling crystals

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant promotional banner is divided into four soft-toned quadrants, creating a balanced, visually appealing grid. The top left quadrant features a bold and stylish header (`heading`) followed by a clean subheading (`subheading`) that introduces the jewelry product. Below that is a gently italicized tagline (`tagline`) enhancing the brand’s charm. The bottom left panel carries a feature list (`description`) emphasizing product quality and types. A large distinct price (`price`) is displayed competitively, along with a rounded rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) that encourages immediate engagement. The product image (`product_image`) occupies the right half diagonally, dramatized on a soft, pastel background.

**Color Palette**:
- Warm Pink (#FFE4E1)
- Soft Ivory (#FAF0E6)
- Blush Coral (#F8C1B8)
- Light Lavender (#FFF0F5)
- Rosy Red (#C85A54)
- Dusty Rose (#D27D77)
- Deep Brown (#4A3B3A)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of elegant earrings designed with a soft and luxurious color scheme. The primary hues featured are a delicate **rose gold** (#EFA6A0) metal base, accentuated with **crystal white** (#FFFFFF) and **diamond sparkle** (#EAEAEA) stones. A subtle **blush pink** (#F6C3C4) adds an elegant contrast in the tulip-shaped motif. The rose gold frames blend seamlessly into the gloss of the stones, giving a fluid and glamorous appearance. Highlights on the edges create depth and brilliance, drawing the eye to the piece’s intricacies. This color palette ensures a sophisticated and feminine appeal for an advertisement banner.
